name: Space Raider (Zenith)
description:
Space Raider: A 2-D Arcade Style Top-Down Shooter

Survive as long as possible. Reach higher scores. How far can you get?

Features:

- Endless Waves

- Progressive Difficulty

- Various Enemy Types

Credits:

Boss Sprite - esbxp - Boss Ship

Other Sprites & Sound Effects - Kenney Assets

Background Music - DLSounds - Star Master Loop

Explosive Visual Effects - Gustav Hagerling - Explosive VFX
